NLU_NOT_ENOUGH_TEXT: Something went wrong with the Natural Language Understanding Service. Make sure you enter enough text in the review.
CLOUDANT_PROBLEM: Problem with Cloudant service. Please make sure the service exists and is connected to your application.
NLU_PROBLEM: Problem with Natural Language Processing service. Please make sure the service exists and is connected to your application.
INVALID_FORM: Invalid form. Go back to the main page and enter all the fields. Notice there is no client side validation in this application.
CLOUDANT_ERROR: Something went wrong with a call to Cloudant.
